content: a pretty and feminine filet triangular crochet shawl that works up quickly using beginner stitches chain half_double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch to construct the delicate triangle lace motif and solid repeats finish with one of the border options or with a delicate yarn fringe this shawl can be made with yarn of any weight/ply and fiber however i recommend using a yarn that yields a soft and lacy drape for a light weight shawl suitable for spring and summer use a 3-5 ply cotton or cotton blend yarn for a warmer shawl try 8 ply wool or acrylic/wool blend i recommend that you swatch with several different sized hooks to determine which hook size will provide a soft and lacy drape with your chosen yarn and gauge the pattern includes a diagram for the first 18 row this diagram is intended to supplement to the written pattern but not replace it **please note ** * this shawl can be resized and made with less or more than 1000m of yarn by adjusting the number of repeats * this shawl pattern is on sale for 50% off until 11 59pm mon 01/02/2021 * the pattern for the shawl is also available for free on my blog minus diagrams stitch count explanation and repeats explanation i hope you enjoy making your shawl as much as i did mine please use #gratitudeshawl on social media so i can find your lovely example shawls you can also tag me @thecrochetfix on social media many thanks to the following fabulous testers for your patience attention to detail and lovely test projects tania barry @shewgirl1 on ig hilda vasica @vasicahilda on ig sharon edwards june robertson sandra malavisi jackie ramsdell @blankiesbyjackie on ig fb and etsy
